channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for MT
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for MT

item.title: Report X-2024040727
item.description:
Report X-2024040727

Identified by scraper @ 2024-04-25T15:11:03+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-03-30
  • City: GREAT FALLS
  • State: MT
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Rail
  • Carrier/Reporter: BNSF RAILWAY COMPANY
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 4500
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: GATX 222223 was found in the Great Falls, MT BNSF yard having dried product on the outside of the car near the B-end around the bolster. This is a jacketed car, so the source was unable to be determined until the contractor made entry into the tank. The tank was washed out and all product removed. A half-dollar size hole was found in the lining in the interior above the location of the exterior product accumulation. The car was cleaned on the outside and inside.
